data.event: It was formed in the year 1819 from neighboring Clark, and Harrison counties.
Legislation was passed on January 2, 1819 by the General Assembly, and the county was established on February 1.
Legislation was passed on January 2, 1819 by the General Assembly, and the county was established on February 1.
John Floyd was killed in 1783 when his party was attacked by Indians in Bullitt County, Kentucky.
